titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, [Dezember 1930]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 131; deutsch: Briefe, S. 181; Cambridge Letters, S. 249).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks so much for your congratulations. Yes, this fellowship business is very gratifying. Let's hope that my brains will be fertile for some time yet. God knows if they will! â€’ I hope to see you again some day before the end of this academic year anyhow.
